fields.name: CreationTime
fields.description: The creation time of the regional restorable database account (ISO-8601 format).

fields.name: DeletionTime
fields.description: The time at which the regional restorable database account has been deleted (ISO-8601 format).

fields.name: LocationName
fields.description: The location of the regional restorable account.

fields.name: RegionalDatabaseAccountInstanceId
fields.description: The instance id of the regional restorable account.
